function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate prediction of infection probability in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Validation of the prediction model using real-world data, regular updates based on new research findings","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation software for infectious disease transmission","People":"Occupants of confined indoor spaces","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Reliance on assumptions about droplet behavior and size","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effectiveness of social distancing and ventilation","Mitigation":"Conducting further research on droplet behavior, validation of assumptions with experimental data","Technologies":"High-speed imaging for droplet observation, computational fluid dynamics simulations","People":"Occupants of confined indoor spaces, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, scientific institutions"},{"Description":"Limited consideration of evaporation effects on infection probability","Impact":"Underestimation of the influence of evaporation on disease transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporation of evaporation effects into the prediction model, validation through experimental studies","Technologies":"Evaporation modeling software, experimental setups for evaporation studies","People":"Occupants of confined indoor spaces, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health organizations"}]}
